articles.title: Voters file emergency lawsuit to stop Georgia governor candidate Brian Kemp from overseeing election
articles.description: Five voters on Tuesday filed an emergency lawsuit to strip Georgia Secretary of State Brian Kemp of his powers to preside over the race for governor in which he is now the Republican candidate.

articles.title: Good early sign for Democrats: Jennifer Wexton unseats GOP Rep. Barbara Comstock in Virginia
articles.description: Voters in the affluent Northern Virginia suburban district have sent Republicans to Congress for 60 of the past 66 years.

articles.title: New Zealand unemployment drops to 10-year low, chance of rate cut distant
articles.description: The unemployment rate dropped to 3.9 percent over the previous quarter — well below the 4.4 percent rate recorded in the last quarter, and is the lowest since the June 2008 quarter.
